The Culprits of Premature Aging and the Secret to Effectivel

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/11/culprits-of-premature-aging-and-secret.html

"You look much younger than your age!"

Aren't you delighted when somebody tells you this? Indeed, looking young always is everybody's aspiration. We don't really mind growing old so long as we're able to preserve our youthful looks. And that explains why there are such extensive research into creating products that can effectively retard premature aging of our skin.

For people aspiring to look young and radiant for years to come, "anti-aging" is obviously the most crucial part in their skin-care regimen.

Accreditations and Endorsements for Shuang Hor Lingzhi

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/11/accreditation-and-endorsements-for.html

In assessing whether a lingzhi is able to perform all the functions as claimed, it is crucial to look for third party accreditations. Any company can lay any sort of claims on its own products. Are these claims substantiated and verified by any authority? If not, you should be able to form your opinion on the capability of the products. Shuang Hor's Lingzhi has received certifications and validations from many parties over the years.

Aquasense Total Renewal Cream: Ingredients of the Ultimate S

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/11/aquasense-total-renewal-cream.html

Aquasense Total Renewal Cream is a skincare product rich in stem cells cultured from Criste Marine, done through a special technology to provide the bio-energy needed in the cellular growth and repair of our skin. It is like having our skin frozen in time, because it helps reduce all those fine lines and brown spots and helps to fade away our blemishes. On top of that, Aquasense Total Renewal Cream has 10 more incredible ingredients that you don't find anywhere else to give you an out-of-this-world complexion.

Flu: More Serious Than You Think

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/11/flu-more-serious-than-you-think.html

Flu (seasonal influenza) is NOT to be mistaken for the common cold. The flu is a serious respiratory infection, which can lead to severe complications and even death. Although flu may seem like a minor illness, the complications that follow are serious, and may even result in death. The best and most effective way to treat flu is by preventing it in the first place. How?

Healthy Bones Can Prevent Diabetes and Manage Your Weight

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/12/healthy-bones-can-prevent-diabetes-and.html

New research findings are beginning to show that strong, healthy bones play a far greater role in our overall health than we previously realised. Apart from preventing osteoporosis, healthy bones are now found to play a huge role in preventing diabetes, reducing the risk of increased fats and preventing cardiovascular disease.

Amino Acid-Base Surfactant: Facial Cleanser's Most Importan

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/12/amino-acid-base-surfactant-facial.html

An ideal facial cleanser feels silky smooth and leaves no residual traces after cleansing. It should also be anti-allergy and offers 100% cleansing power with zero agitation. It should be able to get rid of all facial dirt, aged cutins, sebaceous secretion, perspiration and makeup and give us clear unclogged pores to facilitate efficient absorption of skin-care nutrients. A cleanser with thick lather could be caused by the presence of excessive soap-base thickener which may have little nutritional content. So don't ever think "the more lather, the better".

What Makes The New Generation Jia Hor Fibre So Special

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/12/what-makes-new-generation-jia-hor-fibre.html

Jia Hor Fibre provides about 4g of both water soluble and water insoluble dietary fibres. This product has the honour of earning the JHFA (Japan Health Food Authorization) recognition. It is great news for those of us who are watching our weight as Jia Hor Fibre is low in calories. Further, taking it before meals will give a feeling of fullness in our stomach, therefore translating into reduced total intake of calories and help control our body weight. Jia Hor Fibre has been awarded with 4 accreditations, giving it 4 main benefits.

Colon Cancer: Risk Factors and How To Reduce Them

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2011/12/colon-cancer-risk-factors-and-how-to.html

Colon, or colorectal, cancer is cancer that starts in the large intestine (colon) or the rectum (end of the colon). Most cases of colon cancer begin as small, noncancerous (benign) clumps of cells called adenomatous polyps. Over time some of these polyps become colon cancers. According to the American Cancer Society, colorectal cancer is one of the leading causes of cancer-related deaths in the United States. The good news is, early diagnosis often leads to a complete cure. What are the risk factors and how do you reduce them?

Jia Hor Seasoning: Great Taste and Good Health

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/jia-hor-seasoning-great-taste-and-good.html

Do you cook? What do you use to enhance the flavors or taste of your food? Salt? Oyster sauces? MSG? Gourmet powder is a common type of food flavouring that contains monosodium glutamate (more popularly known as MSG) as its main composition. Though MSG has long been classified as a safe food ingredient by the US Food & Drug Administration (FDA), its use and impact on the human health remains controversial. Jia Hor Seasoning is a formulation that is of 100% natural origin and does not contain any chemical additives. As such, in contrast to other food flavourings, it will never bring about such side-effects as thirst, headache, listlessness or hair loss.

Heartburn: Causes and How to Prevent It

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/heartburn-causes-and-how-to-prevent-it.html

Heartburn is a burning sensation that is felt in the chest and throat, which occurs when the acid from our stomach travels back into the esophagus. The person suffering from heartburn may also experience a sour and acidic taste in the mouth. If you suffer from heartburn / acid reflux more than 2 times a week, this is known as Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD).

How Ganoderma Modulates Our Immune System

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/how-ganoderma-modulates-our-immune.html

Do you know that 80% to 90% of diseases in the human body are closely related to our immune system? This article gives you an overall understanding of how the self-defense function of our immune system works and the contribution of ganoderma in strengthening our immune system, including controlling cancerous tumors.

How Safe Are Your Medicines?

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/how-safe-are-your-medicines.html

In general, drugs/medicines do not heal, but only suppress or control the symptoms, and they have many side-effects. Many of us put much trust in the FDA as a regulator of the safety and effectiveness of drugs in order that the people can confidently consume the drugs prescribed to them. However, events that have happened over the last few decades make this assumption not necessarily always true. So what option do we have?

The Safe and Tasty Ingredients of Jia Hor Food Seasoning

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/safe-and-tasty-ingredients-of-jia-hor.html

The flavour of food is determined by many factors, including its taste, aroma, temperature, overall appearance and our physiological and psychological states, affecting the extent to which we perceive it to be delicious or otherwise - too sweet, too sour, too salty, too bitter or just perfect. What do you use to enhance the flavors of your food? What about a flavor enhancer which not only tastes good but is safe and has many health benefits?

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/no-more-sinus-problem.html

This is a story of how my Dad finally got rid of his sinus problem (which has been plaguing him for at least 30 years).

My Shortest Flu Ever

http://naturalhealthandbeauty101.blogspot.com/2012/01/my-shortest-flu-ever.html

My friend cancelled his lunch appointment with me. Why? Coz he's stuck in bed, sick with "flu, sore throat and a bit of fever". Which triggered me to post this story.

I have suffered from colds and flu many times over the years. I would normally recover from my runny nose, fever and sore throat after a couple of weeks. But my cough would linger on and on and on, up to 2 months or more.

I read that long-term consumption of Lingzhi and Pollen is very effective to enhance one's immune system so that one doesn't fall sick so often. And when one does, the recovery rate is much faster. Really?

Well. It was put to test last week. This is an account of my shortest flu experience that I can ever remember.
